snippet: The figure skater Carolina Kostner, a former world champion, was barred for 16 months for her role in a doping case involving a former boyfriend, the Olympic racewalking gold medalist Alex Schwazer.
abstract: Carolina Kostner is barred from figure skating for 16 months after allegedly helping her boyfriend, Olympic racewalker Alex Schwazer, evade drug test.
lead_paragraph: The figure skater Carolina Kostner, a former world champion, was barred for 16 months for her role in a doping case involving a former boyfriend, the Olympic racewalking gold medalist Alex Schwazer.
